Imaging learning the ak-47 spray pattern for 600 hours straight just to still get out aimed by some 16 year old kid every game, to then retiring from the game every 2 years because you can't seem to beat these stupid kids but for some reason you always get this CS:GO phase once and a while so you do some FFA just to relearn the spray pattern again thinking that this time you got this in the bag but once again just like every other time, you don't learn and get beaten by these same kids, and then retiring for the 7th time in a row.

all in all, it's a good game
if dont give a shit for some boludos destroing your game and only doing shit, this game is for you, but although this, the game is amazing and really good to play with friends.
